titleStmt.title: A godly psalme of Marye Queene which brought vs comfort al, through God, whom wee of dewtye prayse, that giues her foes a fal. By Rychard Beeard. Anno domini. 1553.
titleStmt.author: Beeard, Richard.
Bownell, Thomas. Godly psalme in meetre.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestrete, at the sygne of the faucon against saint Donstons Church by [J. Kingston for] Wylliam Griffith: and are to be solde at his shoppe a lytle aboue the conduit,

notesStmt.note: The 1st psalm has music in 4 parts--STC.
Includes: "A godly psalme in meetre" by Thomas Bownell.
Reproduction of the original in Trinity College (University of Cambridge). Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe a lytle aboue the conduit
the sygne of the faucon against saint Donstons Church
